168             context = f"""
169             You are a requirements extraction assistant. Based on the current session state,

173             Focus Areas: {', '.join(session.focus_areas) if session.focus_areas else 'None'}
174             Questions Asked: {', '.join(session.questions_asked) if session.questions_asked else 'None'}

179             
180             Select the best next question ID from the available options. Consider:

182             2. User's focus areas
183             3. Questions already asked
184             4. Session strategy

186             Return only the question ID.
187             """
